#summary JSON serialization for Handle

== JSON ==

The [http://json.org/ JSON] serialization essentially looks like the following:

{{{
{
    "handle" : "info:hdl/10100/nature" ,
    "handleValues" : [
        {
            "index" : "1" ,
            "type" : "URL" ,
            "data" : "http://www,nature.com/" ,
            "permission" : {
            } ,
            "ttl" : {
            } ,
            "timestamp" : "" ,
            "reference"  : {

            }
        }
    ]          
}
}}}
